Although I am a huge Nautica shoe fan, this was the first time I’ve ever ordered them from Amazon. I always get 9.5 because it’s a tricky size, but since I have four other pairs I decided to try them. The shoes were beautiful but too tight in the toes. They were a bit more dressy than my loafers. The good news is they have another pair in my usual style and just the right color too, so YAY!
